thread.title: Branislav Ivanovic ready to quit Chelsea and snub Everton, Leicester City and West Ham for a big-money move to Zenit St Petersburg
thread.title_full: Branislav Ivanovic ready to quit Chelsea and snub Everton, Leicester City and West Ham for a big-money move to Zenit St Petersburg

author: wdownes
title: Branislav Ivanovic ready to quit Chelsea and snub Everton, Leicester City and West Ham for a big-money move to Zenit St Petersburg
text:
EFL BLUE MOVE Branislav Ivanovic ready to quit Chelsea and snub Everton, Leicester City and West Ham for a big-money move to Zenit St Petersburg 
The 32-year-old has been chased by Premier League sides after impressing everyone apart from Antonio Conte with his versatile performances down the years Breaking
